name: Derhier Elementar
description:
Fight against other Derhier Elementars (pronounced: Derhere Elementaar ) in an epic space battle.

  • Shoot them down
  • Ram them down
  • Shoot through wormholes and see your opponents go crazy
  • Shoot into blackholes and watch the crazyness happen
  • Three incredible gamemodes like "Last Derhier Elementar standing" and others!
  • A catchy soundtrack that gets everyone after playing a few seconds
  • Easy controls, but you can get a pro and shoot the noobs down
  • Just give it a try. It's seriously fun

Controls:

  • A-Button: Thrust forward
  • B-Button: Thrust backward
  • X-Button: Shoot with the amazingly power of a Derhier Elementar
  • Left-Stick: Control your Derhier Elementar

Supports only XBOX360 Gamepads (you can try others, but it's not tested yet)

You can also try: X360CE

Version 1.3

  • Epic Solomode with an outstanding story. Kill all the virus-spaceships!
  • Team Survivalmode
  • Gamestats
  • choose your Derhier Elementar color at the beginning by pressing "Y"
